items.sentence: I don\'t think I\'d mind eating Chinese food every day.
I missed the last bus and had to walk home in the rain.
I never imagined so many people would come to my party.
I saw Tom in the mirror so I turned around and said hi.
I spent three months in a hospital when I was thirteen.
I strongly believe that human imagination is limitless.
I don\'t think Tom would want to go to Boston with you.
I entered Tom\'s bedroom and saw him asleep in his bed.
I guess the question is whether you\'ll be here or not.
It sounds like having time alone has been good for you.
